# Release Notes for Version 5.2.5

## What's New

- Added Gemini 3 Flash model support for speech-to-text transcription with improved accuracy and speed
- Integrated Gemini 3 Flash into prompt processing for enhanced AI-assisted text generation
- Added model initialization notice to help users understand expected performance during first use

---

**Full Changelog**: [5.2.4...5.2.5](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/compare/v5.2.4...v5.2.5)
